ValidationRule.description: Discretionary request must be associated to either an Opportunity or a Campaign.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( CBT__c ) <> "FM&T", Campaign__c = Null, Opportunity__c = Null, Service_Request__c = null )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Discretionary request must be associated to either an Opportunity or a Campaign or a Service Request.
